api_list.name: zombie-matrix
api_list.description: count how many days it takes until everybody turns into zombies
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zombie-matrix.p.rapidapi.com/zombie-matrix"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zombie-matrix.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
